description:
go.net/websocket: update package comment to refer RFC 6455

Fixes issue 5222

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.net

https://codereview.appspot.com/8651044/diff/5001/websocket/websocket.go
File websocket/websocket.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/8651044/diff/5001/websocket/websocket.go#newcode6
websocket/websocket.go:6: // The protocol is defined at http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6455
you can say just RFC 6455.

// ... the WebSocket protocol
// as specified in RFC 6455.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=570c4a52aa17&repo=net ***

go.net/websocket: update package comment to refer RFC 6455

Fixes issue 5222

R=golang-dev, mikioh.mikioh, minux.ma, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/8651044

Committer: Rob Pike <r@golang.org>

subject: code review 8651044: go.net/websocket: update package comment to refer RFC 6455
